verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,-yātrā-chale kṛṣṇera gamana
subhadrā āra baladeva, saṅge dui jana

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; yātrā-chale—on the plea of the car festival; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; gamana—departure; subhadrā—His sister; āra—and; baladeva—His brother; saṅge—with Him; dui jana—two persons.
translation: The Lord said, "Using the car festival as an excuse, Kṛṣṇa goes there with Subhadrā and Baladeva.
